casebody.data:
INTEGRATED LOGISTICS SUPPORT SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Cross Appellant. No. 00-5138, 01-5003. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. June 6, 2002.

Before MICHEL, Circuit Judge, PLAGER, Senior Circuit Judge, and RADER, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
